sentences.en: As far as the eye could seethe beet fields.
sentences.cn: 极目远望,甜菜地一望无际.

sentences.en: Beet tops are somewhat like spinach.
Calcium is also necessary to prevent leakage of potassium during the aging of beet slices.
sentences.cn: 甜菜薄片衰老时期,钙对于防止钾离子丧失,也极其必要.

sentences.en: Cash crops are oil - bearing crops, sugar beet, hemp and so on.
sentences.cn: 经济作物有油料 、 甜菜 、 麻类等.

sentences.en: Cash crops have beet, oilseeds, tobacco, medicinal herbs, hemp, cotton, and other.

sentences.en: He farmed his pickers to work in the beet fields.
sentences.cn: 他出租他的摘棉工去甜菜地里干活.

sentences.cn: 甜菜根腐病接种方法的初步探讨.

sentences.en: Main Compositions: rose essence, azelaic acid, thyme leaf, beet.
sentences.cn: 主要成份: 玫瑰精华 、 杜鹃花酸 、 百里香叶 、 甜菜.

sentences.en: My face is always as red as a beet when I come out of the sauna.
sentences.cn: 每次洗完桑拿,我的脸总是通红.

sentences.en: The biological control progress of beet armyworm and the prospect were reviewed.
sentences.cn: 本文综述了甜菜夜蛾生物防治进展以及对生物防治的展望.

sentences.en: The development of sodium absorption capacity by aging beet slices, however, does not require calcium.
sentences.cn: 然而,随着甜菜薄片的衰老,要提高钠离子的吸收能力, 已经无需钙参与作用了.

sentences.en: The industrial crops are: ( sugar ) beet, flax, tobacco, and so on.

sentences.en: The sugar beet is an entirely different kind of plant.
sentences.cn: 糖用甜菜是一种完全不同的作物.

sentences.en: There sugar - beet plantation areas were expanded to 176000 hectares.
sentences.cn: 他们的甜菜种植面积增加到176000公顷.

sentences.en: They talked endlessly about beet and cattle feed.
sentences.cn: 他们就甜菜和牛饲料的话题谈个没完.
